### Task Table

```{r}
#| label: tasks-table
#| tbl-cap: "Nowcasting tasks (Aug–Oct 2025)"
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)

tasks <- read_csv("gsp_nowcasting_tasks_aug-oct_2025.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  mutate(
    Start = as.Date(Start),
    End = as.Date(End)
  )

knitr::kable(tasks, align = "lccr")
```

```{r}
#| label: "Gantt chart"
#| tbl-cap: "Nowcasting tasks (Aug–Oct 2025)"
gantt <- ggplot(tasks, aes(x = Start, xend = End, y = Task, yend = Task)) +
  geom_segment(linewidth = 8, color = "#4C72B0") +
  labs(
    title = "GSP Nowcasting Project — Gantt Chart (Aug–Oct 2025)",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Phases"
  ) +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 week", date_labels = "%d %b") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12) +
  theme(
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 9),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold")
  )

```
